text: What would you say to them  What are the things that people around you do to help you but it acually causes more harm    I often find that people who really try to help are the ones who acually do more harm then good  For me personally  I would say that it helps me when I can be left alone  when there s less pressure  less expectations and in general just letting me deal with my problems in silence instead of explaining myself all the time which makes things worse and causes more anxiety  Especially when people start to give you this negative attention that makes you feel like you are always this depressive  sad person and that is all they seem to notice  It s almost like you stopped being a real person
summary: People who try to help you do more harm than good. For me, it helps to be left alone when there is less pressure and less expectations. People start to give you negative attention and it makes you feel like you are always depressed.

text: We re actually blessed  my brothers and sisters I hope you are well  But if you struggle with depression and suicidal thoughts like myself  take comfort knowing we re actually blessed with knowledge of experiencing such emotional trials  This has thickened our skin  It has allowed us to move to a new plane of self realization  We know the pain associated with life   Life can be a cold  evil place  People are susceptible to evil  But evil cannot exist without good  dark needs light to exist   Those who travel through a tunnel of depression have been blessed to know the depths of darkness  But the light is grander than the darkness of the tunnel   Stay with us  Keep traveling on this journey  It truly is beautiful despite the tunnels   Imagine your favorite place  Smell the smells  Hear the sounds  Be taken away and just linger a while  Take a few deep breaths and relax   You are loved by a loving God  He has blessed us all   All my love to you all today
summary: If you struggle with depression or suicidal thoughts, take comfort in knowing that God has blessed you with the knowledge of such emotional trials. Life can be a cold evil place, but evil cannot exist without good, and dark needs light to exist.
cleaned: struggle depression suicidal thought comfort know god bless knowledge emotional trial life cold evil place evil not exist good dark need light exist

text: Guys we aren t the youngest generation anymore Wow  we aren t the youngest generation anymore  I just turned   two weeks ago  There s a baby being born somewhere that is gonna go through a completely different education system than I did  They are gonna be affected by the educational policies instituted by the government our generation has a part in electing  They are gonna look at the war crimes that those elected governments commit  just as we have  They are gonna be left with a higher national debt  higher student debt  and more environmental issues than we ve ever known before  I d like to have hope  but I honestly don t  I know that I m gonna give my kids an honest fair and enjoyable life that I never got  but I m not confident the world around them is gonna improve  But there is something we can do  We have become the people that kids look up to  Siblings  strangers  or kids at our local church  All these people younger than us are looking up to us  While we may not be able to solve all the problems the older generation expects us to  we  can  be our best self for the next generation  The only hope I have left for humanity is the strength that I believe our crossgenerational relationship will one day have  Enjoy your night Americans  Good morning asian cultures  and sleep well Europeans
